characters.name: Takemichi Hanagaki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 165 cm

Takemichi learns that the girl he dated in middle school—the only girl he ever dated—has died. Then, after an accident he finds himself in a time leap back to his middle school years. He vows to change the future and save the girl, and to do that he aims to rise to the top of the Kantou region's most brutal delinquent gang.

~!After the fight with Valhalla he becomes the First division Capitan of Toman.!~

~!He later became the eleventh President of the Black Dragons as well as the captain of the First Division of the Tokyo Manji Gang, and a member of Brahman.!~

~!Takemichi is also the president and founder (with Chifuyu Matsuno) of the Thousand Winters (later renamed as Tokyo Manji), created to defeat Kanto Manji.!~

characters.name: Manjirou Sano
characters.description:
__Height:__ 162 cm

He is a founding member and the leader of Tokyo Manji Gang.
 
Mikey is usually a carefree teenager who loves to joke and play pranks around those he considers his close friends. He cares for them greatly and is determined to protect their honor. He rarely shows any sign of weakness, as he believes himself to be the foundation and support for Toman, and if the pillar himself were to display weakness, Toman would also be weakened.

~!Younger brother of [Shinichiro](https://anilist.co/character/221297/Shinichirou-Sano), older half brother of [Emma](https://anilist.co/character/171924/Emma-Sano) and younger "adoptive" brother of [Izana](https://anilist.co/character/170484/Izana-Kurokawa)!~

~!In the future, it is revealed that Mikey is the leader of the gang "Bonten" ,which is considered Japan's current worst criminal organization.!~

~!During the high school timeline it is revealed that Mikey is the leader of the "Kanto Manji Gang".!~

characters.name: Ken Ryuuguji
alt_names: Vice-Leader of The Tokyo 卍 Gang
characters.description:
__Height:__ 185cm (6'1")

Draken is [Mikey's](https://anilist.co/character/145341/Manjirou-Sano) best friend and one of the founders of Toman. 

Draken is a muscular teenager who is exceptionally tall for his age. His head is shaven on the sides and back to expose his signature dragon tattoo on his left temple. His blonde hair is long on the top of his head and kept in a neat braid. Draken is a serious teen who lives in a brothel, he does not know his biological parents and was 'taken in' by the owners of the brothel. ~!His mother was a prostitute who abandoned him at birth and died when he was two years old.!~

~!In the future, Draken owns a bike shop, and is a member of Brahman.!~

characters.name: Hinata Tachibana
characters.description:
__Height:__ 153 cm

Hinata Tachibana is the girlfriend of Takemichi Hanagaki who is the primary reason for Takemichi's desire to change the past. In 2005, Hinata is a 14 year old girl. 

Hinata has light brown eyes and wears her rosy brown hair a little longer than before: it goes beyond her shoulders. She is seen wearing a long black dress with embroidered flowers. She also wears a necklace around her neck, materializing her relationship with Takemichi Hanagaki during their middle school years.

Hinata has a very outgoing and upbeat personality who is highly optimistic and always finds ways to make undesirable situations better. Even when others become demoralized or despair, Hinata remains strong in order to push them forward.

~!On July 4, 2017, Hinata will be killed during a brawl between two Tokyo gangs, along with her brother Naoto Tachibana.!~

characters.name: Keisuke Baji
characters.description:
__Height:__ 175 cm

Captain of the 1st division and one of the founders of the Tokyo Manji Gang.

Baji has a wild personality. He loves the thrill of adrenaline and Mikey himself says that he would punch someone out on the street for no apparent reason, only because he feels like it. In combat, he is never without his trademark grin.

characters.name: Chifuyu Matsuno
characters.description:
__Height:__ 168 cm

Chifuyu is the vice-captain of the First Division of Tokyo Manji gang and Baji's best friend.

~!He is the first one to get to know about Takemichi's time leap ability. After that, he  regularly helps Takemichi to think about saving the future.!~

~!Takemichi sought his help in order to team up and face Kanto Manji, the newest Mikey's gang. He also demands that their team should be called Thousand Winters. Chifuyu also made the uniforms.!~

characters.name: Takashi Mitsuya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm

Mitsuya is the Captain of the Second Division of the Tokyo Manji Gang. He is a calm, levelheaded person who is also the source of positivity in the gang. Despite his rough upbringing, he tackles every day with a smile. Mitsuya is a pacifist, preferring to not get into an altercation if possible, but at the same time, will not hesitate to fight in order to protect what is dear to him.

Older brother of Luna Mitsuya & Mana Mitsuya. He is a childhood friend of [Draken](https://anilist.co/character/145345/Ken-Ryuuguji).

characters.name: Naoto Tachibana
characters.description:
__Height:__ 148 cm (past), 175 cm (present)

Hinata's younger brother. He very much resembles his father.

Naoto is a righteous individual who is also determined to also save his sister. He has a no-nonsense personality and is usually unamused by others' humorous advances. He is also willing to embrace far-fetched possibilities, such as the fact that Takemichi can time-travel, and even make his own hypotheses about it.

~!Before the first time travel, he died together with Hinata. However, after he was warned of his death by Hanagaki and was subsequently saved, he grew up to become a detective and ended up playing a key role in Hanagaki's ability to travel through time.!~ ~!Naoto is the key to activating Takemichi's supernatural time-travel ability. Whether in the past or present, as long as the two shake hands, Takemichi will be transferred to the present (if he is in the past), or the past (if he is in the present). He is also the only person who is aware of the consequences caused by Takemichi's time-traveling aside from Takemichi thus far.!~

(Source: Tokyo Revengers Wiki)

characters.name: Kazutora Hanemiya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 174 cm 

One of the founders of the Tokyo Manji Gang and former number 3 of Valhalla.

Kazutora is a very broken soul; as a child, he was forced to pick between his mom and dad in a case of domestic violence. As a result of his fundamentally non-existent family life, he scorned upon other happy families. Something as simple as seeing children having tender moments with their parents, triggered a sore spot within Kazutora and irritated him deeply.

~!He sat 2 years in juvie for the murder of Shinichirou Sano, and he is expected to face at least 10 years in juvie, for stabbing Keisuke Baji. Even though they were the most important people in Mikey's life, he still forgave Kazutora, and told him that he is a part of Toman.!~

characters.name: Nahoya Kawata
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm

Captain of the Fourth Division of the Tokyo Manji Gang. Brother to [Souya Kawata](https://anilist.co/character/168678/Souya-Kawata).

characters.name: Tetta Kisaki
characters.description:
Kisaki is the principal antagonist of Tokyo Revengers. He's especially known for rising to the top of the Toman at full speed. 

Kisaki is a ruthless, cunning, and ambitious individual who will stop at nothing to achieve his goals. Although average in stature, his power to rule with fear makes even those stronger than he obey him. The entirety of his actions in the entire story revolves around becoming the most powerful and influential criminal in Tokyo.

~! He is also known for organizing the murder of Hinata Tachibana many times. !~ ~!He is later ran over and killed by a truck after a long chase!~

characters.name: Atsushi Sendou
characters.description:
One of Takemichi's best friends in middle school.
~!
It's revealed that he is the person who pushed Takemichi in front of the train at the start of the story.!~

characters.name: Masataka Kiyomizu
characters.description:
Kiyomasa is the leader of the the third years in Shibuya Third Mid school and a former member of Toman.  
~! He is no longer a member of Toman because Tomans leader and vice presidents, Draken and Mikey busted his underground boxing job. !~

characters.name: Takuya Yamamoto
characters.description: Takuya Yamamoto is one of Takemichi's middle school friends and also his childhood friend.

characters.name: Nobutaka Osanai
characters.description:
Osanai is the former president of the Moebius gang.  

~!Toman's leader, Mikey, knocked Osanai out with three kicks when he tried to ambush them with his gang and Draken announced that Moebius will now be under Toman's command, following which Osanai gets stabbed by Pah, much to everyone's shock.!~

characters.name: Emma Sano
characters.description:
__Height:__ 150 cm
~![Mikey](https://anilist.co/character/145341/Manjirou-Sano)'s younger half-sister.!~~!Killed by [Tetta Kisaki](https://anilist.co/character/170483/Tetta-Kisaki).!~

characters.name: Haruki Hayashida
characters.description:
He is one of the founding members of the Tokyo Manji Gang and its former third divisions captain.  

~!He ends up getting sentenced to one year in jail after he stabbed Osanai during the Toman and Moebius confrontation in the hangar or garage.  His arrest led to internal conflicts in Toman and the gang getting split in two.  !~

characters.name: Makoto Suzuki
characters.description: Takemichis friend and a member of the Mizo Middle Five

characters.name: Kazushi Yamagishi
characters.description: One of Takemichi's best friends in middle school.

characters.name: Yasuhiro Mutou
characters.description:
Toman Gang Fifth Division Captain.
~!He later leaves Toman and becomes a Tenjiku Gang executive.!~

characters.name: Ryouhei Hayashi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 176 cm

He is the third division vice-captain of the Tokyo Manji Gang.

characters.name: Shuuji Hanma
characters.description:
__Height:__ 192cm

He is the former acting leader of Moebius following Osanai's defeat.

Hanma's single purpose is to find excitement, relieving his boredom by street violence. Hanma slowly sinks in to apathy since he was winning fights easily, without any resistance, that's why he sooner ally with [Kisaki Tetta](https://anilist.co/character/170483).

characters.name: Hakkai Shiba
characters.description:
__Height:__ 183 cm

Vice Captain of the Second Division of the Tokyo Manji Gang. The younger brother of [Yuzuha](https://anilist.co/character/170482/Yuzuha-Shiba) and the younger brother of [Taiju](https://anilist.co/character/167845/Taiju-Shiba), the leader of the 10th Generation Black Dragons.

Hakkai is shown to be a timid but friendly guy. When it comes to his personality he is nothing like his older brother Taiju who is disciplined and bloodlusted.

Hakkai has deep admiration for [Takashi Mitsuya](https://anilist.co/character/167841/Takashi-Mitsuya)

characters.name: Souya Kawata
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170cm

Vice captain of the Fourth Division of the Tokyo Manji Gang. He's the younger twin brother of [Nahoya Kawata](https://anilist.co/character/168679/Nahoya-Kawata).

characters.name: Seishuu Inui
characters.description:
__Height:__ 177 cm

Former tenth generation Black Dragons commander and the current vice captain of the Black Dragons.

Inupi is usually a stoic and quiet individual. However, he isn't afraid to voice his thoughts and opinions even if it hurts him in the end. He is very committed to the Black Dragon and loyal to Kokonoi, whom he considers his best friend. When he finds people he trusts, he devotes himself to them. He is brave, but will be willing to show his vulnerable side and open up.

characters.name: Hajime Kokonoi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 174 cm

Koko sees the world as a series of calculations. He acts solely in his own interests; every move of his is to benefit himself. He cozies up to those more powerful than he, but will turn his back on them the moment they lose their instrumentality.

~!Former tenth generation Black Dragons commander!~

~!His goal was to collect 40 million yen to save his loved one, Akane but unfortunately, he was too late.!~

characters.name: Ran Haitani
characters.description:
__Height:__ 183 cm

A Tenjiku executive. Rindou's elder brother.

~!He is a member of the S62 generation. He was one of Tenjiku’s 4 Heavenly Kings, and is a Bonten executive in the future.!~

characters.name: Rindou Haitani
characters.description:
__Height:__ 172 cm

A Tenjiku executive. Ran's younger brother.

~!He's a Bonten executive in the future.!~

characters.name: Shinichirou Sano
characters.description: Older brother of [Mikey](https://anilist.co/character/145341/Manjirou-Sano).

characters.name: Ryouko Tachibana
characters.description: Mother of Hinata and Naoto.

characters.name: Chonbo
characters.description: ~!Chonbo is one of the Valhalla captains and expert fighters. !~

characters.name: Chome
characters.description: ~!Chome is one of the Valhalla captains and also one of its expert fighters. !~

characters.name: Hansen
characters.description: Hansen is a character affiliated with the Ikebukuro Criminal Black Members.

characters.name: Gariman
characters.description: Gariman is the leader of Night Dust, a top gang in tokyo, which governs the Ueno territory.

characters.name: Choji Ahane
characters.description: Choji is one of Valhalla's Captains and Kisaki's cronies.

characters.name: Masaru
characters.description: [Takemichi](https://anilist.co/character/145342/)'s cousin and a third year student in Shibuya Middle School. He claimed to be the leader of the delinquents at his school, only to be exposed as the servant of [Kiyomasa](https://anilist.co/character/171921) and his friends.

characters.name: Haruchiyo Sanzu
characters.description:
__Height:__ 172 cm

Vice captain of the 5th division in the Tokyo Manji Gang.
